means: （修士或修女）赤脚的，仅穿拖鞋的

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... jaundiced 有偏见的 discalced 赤脚的，没穿鞋的 jaded 疲惫的，厌倦的.
discalced的意思、解释 adj.  1. (修士或修女)赤脚的; 仅穿拖鞋的discalced的用法例句 1. discalced adj. 赤脚的, 仅穿拖鞋的查看更多有关discalced的例句.
monastic僧侣，修道士；庙宇的discalced赤脚的，没穿鞋的steed马，骏马

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: variant, influenced by French déchaux, of earlier discalceated, from Latin discalceatus, from dis- (expressing removal) + calceatus (from calceus 'shoe')

means.word_mean: 1. (used of certain religious orders) barefoot or wearing only sandals;
